entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @RandPaul Your distortion of this situation is irresponsible. Take your own advice & step back. With a medical degree, it seems you’d be smart enough 2 know that church goers aren’t being quarantined 4 being Christians, but because of the danger #coronavirus poses 2 them & their community
